EmailTemplate.name: 18-Smart Cities-City as a platform-Email-Nurture SmartCity-T003GY.Email 3 Bristo
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how Bristol became one of the UK’s smartest city
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Case Study SmartCitiesWorld profile: Bristol Bristol, England is using smart technologies and approaches to address its most pressing challenges, deliver better services and improve quality of life for its citizens. It was named the UK’s smartest city in 2017. Read this SmartCitiesWorld <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/205915?did=d0000000018a&utm_campaign=city_as_a_platform&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email3:bristol-case-study&utm_term=smartcity]]> case study to learn how the Bristol is Open venture is using the concept of an open, programmable city to make a difference in people’s lives. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
